description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. An adventurer lost on a mysterious island faces the dangers of a runic quest. Every game is different! Lots of replay value with 186 random levels. Test your mental agility while the time is running out!
